name: Taking the W
description:
Based on the YouTube channel called Surreal Entertainment, comes a game, so buggy, you'd think no effort was involved.

Features:  Playing as Sheldon from the Big Bang Theory, Witty-Self-aware humor, Fully Voiced Characters, Cutscenes, Quests, and a whole load of bugs

(Note: The art style is a  *DELIBERATE*  imitation  of Surreal Entertainment)
